Uses of Package
io.github.ai4ci.abm

Packages that use io.github.ai4ci.abm
Package
Description
io.github.ai4ci.abm
High-level documentation for the agent-based modelling package io.github.ai4ci.abm.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.inhost
In-host models for simulating viral infection dynamics within individuals.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy
Policy models for outbreak-level interventions and control strategies.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.riskmodel
Bayesian risk estimation models for individual infectious probability assessment.
io.github.ai4ci.config
Provides configuration interfaces for epidemiological simulations and experiments.
io.github.ai4ci.config.execution
Execution configuration types and helpers used during experiment runs.
io.github.ai4ci.config.inhost
Configurations for inâ€‘host disease progression models used within persons.
io.github.ai4ci.config.setup
Configuration types and helpers that describe how a simulation population and its social network are constructed.
io.github.ai4ci.flow
Simulation execution and data flow management for agent-based modelling.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders
Build-time and setup documentation for the model builder components in io.github.ai4ci.abm.builders.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics
Core mechanics and infrastructure for agent-based modeling operations.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.output
Writers, exporters and related types for simulation output.
io.github.ai4ci.output
Data export and output generation for simulation results and analytics.
io.github.ai4ci.util
 
  • Classes in io.github.ai4ci.abm used by io.github.ai4ci.abm
    Class
    Description
    Abstraction.Entity
    Base interface for identifiable entities within the modeling framework.
    Abstraction.HistoricalStateProvider
    Interface for providing access to historical state data.
    Abstraction.TemporalState
    Interface for temporal states that track entity evolution over time.
    Contact
    A contact between two people.
    Exposure
    Represents a successful transmission event from an infectious individual (exposer) to another individual (exposee).
    HistoryMapper
    Generated mapping from current state to history entries.
    ImmutableOutbreakHistory.Builder
    Builds instances of type ImmutableOutbreakHistory.
    ImmutableOutbreakState.Builder
    Builds instances of type ImmutableOutbreakState.
    ImmutablePersonDemographic
    Immutable implementation of PersonDemographic.
    ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder
    Builds instances of type ImmutablePersonHistory.
    ImmutablePersonState.Builder
    Builds instances of type ImmutablePersonState.
    ModelUpdate.OutbreakUpdaterFn
    Outbreak-level updaters: run once per day during the updateState phase (see Updater.updateState(Outbreak)).
    ModelUpdate.PersonUpdaterFn
    Person-level updaters: run for every person during the updateState phase (see Updater.updateState(Person)).
    ModifiableOutbreak
    A modifiable implementation of the Outbreak type.
    ModifiablePerson
    A modifiable implementation of the Person type.
    Outbreak
    The central mutable container for an entire simulation instance.
    OutbreakBaseline
    Simulation wide parameters that do not change over the course of the simulation.
    OutbreakHistory
    The historical state of the whole model.
    OutbreakState
    The current state of the outbreak.
    OutbreakTemporalState
    Any data related to the state of the outbreak which is valid only in a specific time point.
    Person
    The main Person class is a mutable holder that contains immutable data pertaining to baseline, current state, recent history etc.
    PersonBaseline
    Baseline parameters for a person in the simulation.
    PersonDemographic
    Represents the demographic information of a Person in the simulation.
    PersonHistory
    Historical patient data relevant to the ongoing simulation.
    PersonState
    The person's current state within a single simulation timestep.
    PersonTemporalState
    Any data related to the state of the people in the model which is valid only in a specific time point.
    SocialRelationship
    Represents a weighted social relationship (an edge) between two individuals in the simulation's social network.
    TestResult
    Models a testing process and its outcome for an individual in the simulation.
    TestResult.Indication
    Defines the indication for which a test was performed.
    TestResult.Result
    Represents the possible outcomes of a test.
    TestResult.Type
    Defines the types of tests available in the simulation, each with its specific parameters.
